page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF........
page.content: {Mary-Anne Fletcher-Jones and Caroline {Landon. We are going to tell you about what we did on the 15th June 1985.Mary-Anne woke up at 8.30 and had a cup of tea. She got dressed into jeans and a t-shirt and went down to breakfast.It consisted of cornflakes and milk,toast and a cup of tea.In the meantime,10.oo at Carolines house,she was feeding her guinea-pig.Then she went indoors and got changed into her jodhpurs.By this time it was 10.40.She went outside and tacked up her pony Dick.After this she had a lesson on him.Mary-Anne went shopping at 12.00.When she got home she had smoked mackerel and salad for lunch.She went to Caroline's house at 2.40.They went for a ride on the ponies.Mary-Anne went home at 5.45pm. Caroline stayed up to watch Dynasty on TV and then she went to bed.
